Weather Another cold day in Chicago before highs in the 40s this weekend By Laura Bannon
December 13, 2024 / 5:46 AM CST / CBS Chicago
Another cold day in Chicago before highs in the 40s this weekend Another cold day in Chicago before highs in the 40s this weekend 02:11 CHICAGO (CBS) â€” Another brutally cold morning as temperatures start off in the single digits.
Highs on Friday rebound into the middle and upper 20s. Clouds increase late in the day and night.
Saturday starts off dry, but rain develops in the afternoon. It is breezy and wet conditions continue into the Saturday night and early Sunday morning.
Temperatures climb with highs in the 40s.
Another system brings in rain on Monday. Colder conditions follow on Tuesday and Wednesday.
More from CBS News Arctic temperatures to put Chicago in deep freeze by Thursday Slowly warming temperatures this weekend for Chicago after brief deep freeze Dangerously cold wind chills arrive, snow showers possible Thursday What is a polar vortex and how cold will it make Chicago? Winning $700K Lucky Day Lotto ticket sold at Irving Park grocery store In: Weather Forecast Chicago Laura Bannon Laura Bannon is the weekday morning meteorologist at CBS2. A native of Chicagoland, Laura grew up in Naperville. She is an Emmy-nominated meteorologist and holds her NWA Seal of Approval.
